org.trianacode.gui.extensions

Interface Extension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Daxifier, DownloadWorkflowExtension, PublishWorkflowExtension, TaskTypeRepoPanel

    public interface Extension
    An interface implemented by all extension classes. An extension can supply a workspace action, which appears in the pop-up dialog for individuals tool in the workspace; a tool tree action, which appears in the pop-up dialog for individual tools in the tool tree; and a workflow action which appears in the main menu,
